mapper.select: /* com.diquest.ta.util.mapper.UtilDao : 일별 콜리스트 조회 */ SELECT 'A' AS `ALL` , RCI.R_FILE_NM , GROUP_CONCAT(STT_SNTC_CONT SEPARATOR ',') AS CONTENT FROM TA_PLATFORM.REC_CALL_INFO RCI INNER JOIN TA_PLATFORM.TA_CALL_MAPPER TM ON RCI.R_FILE_NM = TM.NEW_ID INNER JOIN STT_LOTTE.STT_RST SR ON TM.OLD_ID = SR.RECORDKEY WHERE 1 = 1 AND RCI.YYYYMMDD = '20200520' GROUP BY RCI.R_FILE_NM
